attributes.action: Stop the takeover of British Energy by EDF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prevent the takeover of British Energy by French owned EDF. The energy for the UK needs to be controlled by British people not by the French. Already gas and electricty supplies and pipelines are foreign owned. There is no control over pricing apart from ineffective watchdog organisations. STOP THIS TAKEOVER NOW and let us be in control of our own destiny.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
